content.title: Enabling 36 | Reading Comprehension
content.instruction: Read the entire passage below. Click on bold words to see english translation. Check all statements that...checks boxes of applicable summary statements and leaves boxes of the statements that do not apply to the passage empty. Remember that you can have three times to check your answers.

set.note: cultural or linguistic note if needed
set.tl_txt: Ella es una mujer rubia y lleva un uniforme militar.
set.first_hint: english appropriate hints for first incorrect response for this set
set.second_hint: english appropriate general hints for second incorrect response for this set
